page.title: 13UNEMPLOYMENT IN COATBRIDGE
page.content: The{unemployment rate}in the {Coatbridge area}at the moment is very high about{24%. When we contacted the{D.H.S.S.}we found that the{greatest number {unemployed}were in the{group 16_18 {years}with the{under 25's}a close second. The people{unemployed}are mostly {unskilled}or{semi_skilled}people. {Jobs available}in our area are in the{Retail and Distribution Trade}and {Marshall's Chunky Chicken Factory}take people for{summer relief}at this time. {School leavers}have{several courses open to them. They can pursue their education in{Higher or Further {Education,}take a place on the{Youth {Training Scheme,}find a{job}or remain {unemployed. In our area the{majority of school {leavers}take the{Youth Training Scheme
